name: beads of orange glass
description:
beads of orange glass

beads of orange glass was commissioned for the no quarter exhibition, october 2015. it was a pleasure being able to work on something so glitchy and experimental

the game is local multiplayer (no online). it is also quite playable, (though it's a rather different experience) with one person.

windows build available now, mac + linux inbound over the next few days.
